items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: NHPC, United Spirits, Aster DM Healthcare, GSFC, Gland Pharma, KPR Mills, Dixon Tech, IRCON, Nazara Tech in focus on 21 May
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 21 May: Stocks like Gland Pharma, Dixon Technologies, KPR Mills, IRCON International, Nazara Technologies, Edelweiss Financial Services, Protean eGov Technologies, Axiscades Technologies, Accretion Pharmaceuticals, NHPC, United Spirits, Aster DM Healthcare, and Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals will be in focus on May 21.

items.title: Asian stocks gain, oil rises on Israel-Iran report
items.description: Benchmarks in Australia, South Korea and Japan all climbed, pushing a gauge of Asian shares 0.4% higher in early trade.
